bibl.title: Paphiaca I. A Personification of the Nile on a Bone Plaquette from Nea Paphos.
bibl.note: From Tomb P.M. 2780 (Tomb 16/1985) in the Eastern Necropolis of Nea Paphos. Made in Egypt, late 1st-mid 2nd century A.D. Technique and Iconography.
bibl.seg: MICHAELIDES D., Paphiaca I. A Personification of the Nile on a Bone Plaquette from Nea Paphos.
